Colorado continued to see novel coronavirus cases and hospitalizations increase during the Thanksgiving holiday, with 1,682 people in the hospital with confirmed COVID-19 on Friday.

articles.title: Austin Public Health Urges People Who Gathered For Thanksgiving To Get Tested And Stay Home - KUT
articles.description: "Those who have already gathered or traveled need to make sure that they take the proper precautions to stay safe," Austin Public Health's director said.
